sentences.en: accusations of institutional racism in the police force
sentences.cn: 对警察队伍中已形成风气的种族主义的谴责

sentences.en: An institutional advertising approach as means of bank image projection has become particularly relevant.
sentences.cn: 银行形象广告为形成银行形象的方法已经具有特别重要的意义.

sentences.en: Another institutional shareholder , Northern Trust, is planning to raise concerns.
sentences.cn: 另一家机构投资者——北美信托银行( NorthernTrust )也打算表明自己的顾虑.

sentences.en: At present, China's domestic institutional investors have accounted to 50 %.
sentences.cn: 中国目前国内机构投资者的占比已经到了50%左右.

sentences.en: Cultivar development may come to rely more upon the non - institutional peach breeders.
sentences.cn: 品种发展也许最终将更多地依靠非专业的桃育种工作者.

sentences.en: Institutional advertising generates the long - term build - up of a bank's name.
sentences.cn: 银行形象广告可以 长期 地建立银行的声誉.

sentences.en: Institutional changes are also necessary to maximize the potential of this new physical and human investment.
sentences.cn: 为了使这种实物和人力投资的潜力达到最大,体制上的变革也是必要的.

sentences.en: Institutional investors are also holding more cash, according to recent surveys.
sentences.cn: 而最近的调查显示,机构投资者也在持有更多的现金.

sentences.en: Institutional investors'record on big bids has not been good.
sentences.cn: 机构投资者在大型交易中的记录一向不佳.

sentences.en: It attracts private and institutional collectors in all fields around the globe.
sentences.cn: 它吸引了全球各个领域的私人和机构收藏者.

sentences.en: Many hedge funds are likely to stay registered, to reassure institutional investors.
sentences.cn: 为使机构投资者安心,许多避险基金可能暂停注册.

sentences.en: Most government bonds are marketed to big institutional investors such as banks.
sentences.cn: 希腊多数国债都是面向银行等大型机构投资者销售的.

sentences.en: Subsequent developments in the law have made Morgan's reservations about the institutional decision largely irrelevant.
sentences.cn: 随后的法律的发展使"摩根 " 案对机关组织的裁定的保留原则大体上成为不相关的意见.

sentences.en: The method includes environmental motivation, institutional motivation, cultural motivation and adaptable motivation.
sentences.cn: 柔性激励包括环境激励 、 度激励 、 化激励、变激励.

sentences.en: The share price will be determined by bidding from institutional investors.
sentences.cn: 股票价格将由机构投资商的出价决定。

sentences.en: We like the definition proposed by the Council of Institutional Investors ( CII ).
sentences.cn: 我们比较赞同机构投资者理事会 ( CII ) 提出的定义.

words.tran_cn: 制度；建立；（社会或宗教等）公共机构；习俗
开始（调查）；制定；创立；提起（诉讼）

phrases.tran_cn: 制度安排；制序安排；机构安排
有组织的集体投资者；金融机构投资者
机构式销售；公共饮食业
制度结构；体制结构；[建筑]公共机构建筑物

trans.tran_cn: 由来已久的， 习以为常的， 公共机构的， 慈善机构的
trans.tran_en: institutional attitudes and behaviour have existed for a long time in an organization and have become accepted as normal even though they are bad
